Home.Headline: Welcome!
Home.Subtitle: Full-stack developer at your service
Home.Intro: I'm a recent graduate from Computer Engineering
Home.Intro2: I've worked on multiple projects as a full-stack developer and I'm looking forward to work on more.
Home.Intro3: This is my personal webpage to keep track of my work and also submit some personal projects here.
Home.Intro4: If you'd like to work with me,
Home.ProjectsIntro: These are some of the projects I've worked on

QMCVDA.Title: QMC VDA System
QMCVDA.About: System to help recruiters & administrative staff manage existing and upcoming clients that want to subscribe to one or more of the company's various courses & certifications. I mainly helped in the retrieval of client data & creation of pages to ease the technical reviews of each client and determine if the requirements of each course were met.

DALACARE.Title: Electronic Verification Views
DALACARE.About: Implemented the feature for electronic verification in both mobile and desktop platforms. The feature was mainly for inputting and viewing electronic signatures provided by the caretakers and care recipients. Included a settings page that handled if the client wanted to include the module on their offices or not.

FACERECOGNITION.Title: Face Recognition App
FACERECOGNITION.About: Developed a face recognition application that determined wheter a person was registered or not on the current tenant and denied access for people that weren't registered. Included the capability for people to register themselves to the organization & submit their own profile picture in order to be recognized. Application was aided with the use of AI & face recognition services from Azure.

TASKMANAGER.Title: Task Managing App
TASKMANAGER.About: Developed an application for assigning tasks to different people within an organization. Included validation via JWT tokens & encryption of user data in database
